projects.description: MovieFlix is a Netflix-inspired streaming platform powered by the TMDB API, enabling users to explore, watch, and manage movies and TV shows with a dynamic and intuitive interface.

projects.description: A comprehensive AI-powered math assistant featuring a FastAPI backend with vector database functionality and a React frontend built with Vite.
